item.title: Bishop of major Catholic diocese exempts parishioners from Mass over fears of ICE raids
item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom pointed to the decree to highlight the Trump administration's aggressive immigration enforcement actions.

item.title: Pomp and pageantry for Macron in Britain, but Trump's tariffs are stealing the limelight
item.description: French President Emmanuel Macron and his wife are being treated to the best of British pomp and pageantry during their three-day state visit to the U....

item.title: European Union in limbo as Washington keeps it waiting on a trade agreement
item.description: The transatlantic trading partners could however reach a framework deal as soon as this week.

item.title: Trump says 50% tariff on copper imports will begin Aug. 1
item.description: Trump wrote on Truth Social that he made the decision after receiving a national security assessment.

item.title: Trump names Transportation Secretary Duffy as interim NASA administrator
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday that he was directing Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy to be the interim administrator of NASA.
